```prolog
Bot: {bot} ms
API: {api} ms
Shard: {shard} ms
```

-# In case of bugs or issues, join the support server.

guildCreate.title: ğŸ‰ Thanks for adding `{client}`
guildCreate.description:
ğŸ”¹ My default prefix is `{prefix}`, but slash commands (`/`) are recommended!

ğŸ“– To get started, use `/help` in this server.
ğŸŒ Need to change the language? Try `/language set`.

ğŸ’¡ If you have questions, join our [support server]({support}).
